summary: A mod that adds a tavern to Whiterun called Hall of the Followers.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a tavern to Whiterun
called Hall of the Followers. This
tavern contains followers that use
different weapons and fighting styles.
The followers are not fully voiced as
of now, they use the default voices
that Bethesda made. I may or may not
look for voice actors to voice the
followers. In later updates, I will
add a back story to each of the followers.
The followers are as follows.

=====================================

Arkon Soul-Bane: Heavy Armor/Two-Handed | Nord

Ambreth: Mage | Dunmer

Ak'Hir: Assassin? | Khajit

Calvario: Light Armor/One Handed | Imperial

=====================================

There is also a merchant added to the tavern
named Abevild, who is a Nord female and has
a hunters inventory.

=====================================

Please make sure to leave feedback on the mod.
This is my second mod and I want it to be as
good as possible. Also post if you would like
to voice act for one of the followers or the
merchant.

Also note that the location of Ysoldas house was moved. I liked the location better for the hall. Since Ysolda is scripted to go through the door of her home, change of location should not matter.
author: Zediious
